name: slamax
description: Calculates maximum composite SLA for a list of sequentially provided cloud services or your custom-defined services
author: Mikael Vesavuori

scripts.build: rm -rf build && npx webpack && mv build/src/index.d.ts build && rm -rf build/tests && npm run fix:export
scripts.build:hosting: npm run docs && cp -r diagrams typedoc-docs
scripts.fix:export: echo "export { default as SlaMax } from './src/adapters/library';" > build/index.d.ts
scripts.docs: npm run docs:depcruise && npm run docs:typedoc
scripts.docs:depcruise: npx depcruise --include-only '^src' --output-type dot src | dot -T svg > diagrams/dependencygraph.svg
